snippet.title: Infection Free Zone - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Infection Free Zone is available NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1465460/Infection_Free_Zone/

About Infection Free Zone:
Take charge of a group of survivors from your city. Choose your base of operations, then rebuild and readapt the buildings around you to create a self-sustaining settlement. And when the night falls - Defend the zone from the infected! Play on ANY CITY IN THE WORLD, using real geographical data! 

Follow Games Operators:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesOperators
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GamesOperators/
Official Website - http://www.gameops.pl/
Discord - https://discord.gg/R3PMYzY
